content:
@WG-prioritization/alerts issue #92109 has been requested for prioritization.

Procedure

  • Priority?
  • Regression?
  • Notify people/groups?
  • Needs I-nominated?
I'm not 100% sure but this comment seems to indicate it is not a rustc issue? I can't identify an actionable for us.
It sounds like rustc should be inserting the LLVM pass when the option is set.

My impression was that running the pass anywhere in rustc would be too early (e.g., for linker plugin based LTO), so the fix would ultimately be in LLVM: https://github.com/llvm/llvm-project/issues/52853
Might be worth referring it to #t-compiler/wg-llvm or someone like that? Not sure if this would be in their purview.
Ehh, it may not worth it. It's not like this is a particularly important issue or something.
